question:
Which of the following statements are correct about Coalition Against Wildlife Trafficking (CAWT)?
1. It aims to end the illegal trade in wildlife and wildlife products through focusing public and political attention and resources on the issue.
2. It was initiated in 2007.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Coalition Against Wildlife Trafficking (CAWT) which was initiated in 2005, aims to end the illegal trade in wildlife and wildlife products through focusing public and political attention and resources on the issue.
